::Feline::

She smiled at him. "I came here in a pod.  Just as I was emerging 
from the pod in my new form, someone came up from behind me and 
knocked me out."  
She looked down and had a sad look on her face.
"I was captured held for months.  They wanted information about the 
maximals.  I told them that I didn't even know anyone on the planet. 
They didn't believe me." She looked away and closed her eyes. She had 
a pained expression on her face. "I was nothing more than a toy to 
then. Something to torment and play with." She put her hands over her 
face. She cried.  

She wiped her face and dried her eyes. "I managed to escape.  It was 
by the grace of the Matrix that I found my way here." She gave 
Chordate a slight smile. "I'm sorry to have to trouble you with this. 
It's not exactly a nice story to tell." She looked down and rubber 
her hadns together in a nervous fashion.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Chordate:
> 
> 
> Chordate sighed, watching Feline's heavenly figure, looking at all 
her 
> curves.  Her walk was almost celestial to Chordate.  He walked over 
to her 
> after she had asked him to join her, sitting down next to her, 
taking a big 
> gulp of his liquid energon, looking at her tail, then looking over 
her 
> beautiful face.
> "So...where'd you come from?"
